content.description: The following is an excerpt from a motet by Mozart.
content.question: The meter signature is most likely

choices.label: a meter of two four time
a meter of Three four time
a meter of three eight time
a meter of six eight time

content.answer: a meter of Three four time

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in notated music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
